languages.text: В ответ на попытку удалить маяк молниеносно срабатывают ошейники и цепи, сковывающие мутантов — они испускают череду разрушительных импульсов, медленно раздувая и взрывая тварей, одну за другой. В чудовищной агонии, извиваясь и крича от невыносимой боли, жертвы гемункула наконец обретают смерть и долгожданную свободу.

traits.locale_text: В ответ на попытку удалить маяк молниеносно срабатывают ошейники и цепи, сковывающие мутантов — они испускают череду разрушительных импульсов, медленно раздувая и взрывая тварей, одну за другой. В чудовищной агонии, извиваясь и крича от невыносимой боли, жертвы гемункула наконец обретают смерть и долгожданную свободу.

languages.text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.
languages.original_text: В ответ на попытку удалить маяк молниеносно срабатывают ошейники и цепи, сковывающие мутантов — они испускают череду разрушительных импульсов, медленно раздувая и взрывая тварей, одну за другой. В чудовищной агонии, извиваясь и крича от невыносимой боли, жертвы гемункула наконец обретают смерть и долгожданную свободу.

In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

languages.text: 当侦查队员拆除信标的时候，那些将变种人捆在一起的项圈和链条突然被激活了，释放出一系列破坏性脉冲。变种人的身体开始慢慢膨胀，随后一个接一个爆炸。血伶人的受害者无法忍受这种噩梦般的痛苦，他们不断扭动着、尖叫着，最终迎来了死亡，以及他们期待已久的自由。
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

traits.locale_text: 当侦查队员拆除信标的时候，那些将变种人捆在一起的项圈和链条突然被激活了，释放出一系列破坏性脉冲。变种人的身体开始慢慢膨胀，随后一个接一个爆炸。血伶人的受害者无法忍受这种噩梦般的痛苦，他们不断扭动着、尖叫着，最终迎来了死亡，以及他们期待已久的自由。

languages.text: ビーコンが取り外されようとすると、変異体たちを縛っていた首輪と鎖が突然作動し、破壊的なインパルスが次々と放出され、獣たちはゆっくりとふくらみ、爆発する。悪夢のような苦痛の中で、耐え難い痛みに身悶えし、悲鳴を上げながら、ハモンキュラスの犠牲者たちはついに死と切望した自由を与えられるのだ。
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

traits.locale_text: ビーコンが取り外されようとすると、変異体たちを縛っていた首輪と鎖が突然作動し、破壊的なインパルスが次々と放出され、獣たちはゆっくりとふくらみ、爆発する。悪夢のような苦痛の中で、耐え難い痛みに身悶えし、悲鳴を上げながら、ハモンキュラスの犠牲者たちはついに死と切望した自由を与えられるのだ。

languages.text: En respuesta al intento de retirada de la baliza, los collares y cadenas que atan a los mutantes se activan de repente, emitiendo una serie de impulsos destructivos que hinchan y hacen explotar a las bestias una tras otra. En una agonía horrible, retorciéndose y chillando de un dolor insoportable, las víctimas del Hemónculo mueren y obtienen la ansiada libertad.
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

traits.locale_text: En respuesta al intento de retirada de la baliza, los collares y cadenas que atan a los mutantes se activan de repente, emitiendo una serie de impulsos destructivos que hinchan y hacen explotar a las bestias una tras otra. En una agonía horrible, retorciéndose y chillando de un dolor insoportable, las víctimas del Hemónculo mueren y obtienen la ansiada libertad.

languages.text: Als Reaktion auf den Versuch, den Sender zu entfernen, werden plötzlich die Halsbänder und Ketten aktiviert, die die Mutanten miteinander verbinden. Sie senden eine Reihe destruktiver Impulse aus, durch die sich die Ungeheuer eines nach dem anderen aufblähen, bis sie explodieren. Unter albtraumhaften Qualen, vor unerträglichen Schmerzen zuckend und schreiend, dürfen die Opfer des Haemonculus endlich sterben und es wird ihnen die lang erwartete Freiheit geschenkt.
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

traits.locale_text: Als Reaktion auf den Versuch, den Sender zu entfernen, werden plötzlich die Halsbänder und Ketten aktiviert, die die Mutanten miteinander verbinden. Sie senden eine Reihe destruktiver Impulse aus, durch die sich die Ungeheuer eines nach dem anderen aufblähen, bis sie explodieren. Unter albtraumhaften Qualen, vor unerträglichen Schmerzen zuckend und schreiend, dürfen die Opfer des Haemonculus endlich sterben und es wird ihnen die lang erwartete Freiheit geschenkt.

languages.text: En réponse à la tentative d'extraction de la balise, les chaînes et colliers liant les mutants ensemble s'activent subitement, émettant une série d'impulsions destructrices qui font lentement enfler les créatures jusqu'à explosion. Après s'être débattues dans les affres d'une agonie insoutenable, les victimes de l'hémoncule sont enfin délivrées de leur calvaire et rendent l'âme avec un ultime cri de douleur.
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.

traits.locale_text: En réponse à la tentative d'extraction de la balise, les chaînes et colliers liant les mutants ensemble s'activent subitement, émettant une série d'impulsions destructrices qui font lentement enfler les créatures jusqu'à explosion. Après s'être débattues dans les affres d'une agonie insoutenable, les victimes de l'hémoncule sont enfin délivrées de leur calvaire et rendent l'âme avec un ultime cri de douleur.

languages.text: Parıldağın götürülme girişimine yanıt olarak mutantları birbirlerine bağlayan zincirler ve tasmalar aniden harekete geçiyor, yaratıkların yavaşça şişip patlamasına neden olan bir dizi yıkıcı darbe yayıyor. Dayanılmaz bir ızdırap içinde debelenen Haimonkulus'un kurbanları, nihayet çilelerinden kurtulup son bir acı çığlığıyla ruhlarını teslim ediyor.
languages.original_text: In response to the beacon's attempted removal, the collars and chains binding the mutants together suddenly activate, emitting a series of destructive impulses that slowly inflate and explode the beasts one after the other. In nightmarish agony, writhing and shrieking from unbearable pain, the Haemonculus's victims are finally granted their deaths and long-awaited freedom.
